problem_text_cn: 如图,点P在⊙O外,PA是⊙O的切线,点C在⊙O上,PC经过圆心O,与圆交于点B,若∠P=46°,则∠ACP=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point P is outside ⊙O, PA is the tangent of ⊙O, point C is on ⊙O, PC passes through center O, and intersects the circle at point B, if ∠P = N_0, then ∠ACP = ()
raw_answer: 解:如图:连接AO∵PA是⊙O的切线∴∠OAP=90°又∵∠P=46°∴∠AOP=44°∵AO=CO∴∠ACO=∠CAO∵∠ACO+∠CAO=∠AOP∴∠ACO=22°即∠ACP=22°故选:B．
